attributes.action: Airport/Port Coronavirus checks deep cleaning procedures in place.
attributes.additional_details:
Why has the government not learnt from our past?
There is still a lot we do not know about COVID 19 and Coronavirus and it’s long term effect on survivors, it’s too early in our knowledge, not to take every precautionary measure
As part of the Containment and Delay Strategy we should protect our Borders and spread within the U.K. population.
‘Safe than Sorry’, is better for economics long term.
We Already know it is contracted person to person within communities and already has fatalities.
attributes.background:
WW1 soldiers fighting were deployed from all over the British, German & French Empires.
Incl.,Africa, India or West Indies fighting Europe’s battle, what started out as Trench Fever, became  influenza which wiped out more people than both WW1 & WW11 combined. 
Partly due to Troops carrying it home

rejection.details:
We understand that you want the Government to take more action in response to coronavirus, but it's not clear exactly what you want the Government to do.

We have published a number of petitions which relate to things you raise in your petition.

Implement UK lockdown for preventing spread of COVID19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301397

Close down all UK airports & seaports to prevent further spreading of Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
